mod.name: The Runesmith
mod.credits:
BDWSSBB - Card descriptions wording improvements.
Dalamzi - Korean translation.
Rita-Bernstein - Chinese translation.
Slathos - Polish translation.
mod.description: Add a new class called The Runesmith

cards.name: Aqua Decay
cards.description:
Gain 2 runesmith:Potency this turn.
Lose all runesmith:Aqua.
Gain runesmith:Ignis and runesmith:Terra equal to runesmith:Aqua lost.

cards.name: Aqua Decay+
cards.description:
Gain 2 runesmith:Potency this turn.
Lose all runesmith:Aqua.
Gain runesmith:Ignis and runesmith:Terra equal to runesmith:Aqua lost.

cards.name: Ignis Decay
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Lose all runesmith:Ignis.
Gain runesmith:Terra and runesmith:Aqua equal to runesmith:Ignis lost.

cards.name: Ignis Decay+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Lose all runesmith:Ignis.
Gain runesmith:Terra and runesmith:Aqua equal to runesmith:Ignis lost.

cards.name: Terra Decay
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Lose all runesmith:Terra.
Gain runesmith:Ignis and runesmith:Aqua equal to runesmith:Terra lost.

cards.name: Terra Decay+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Lose all runesmith:Terra.
Gain runesmith:Ignis and runesmith:Aqua equal to runesmith:Terra lost.

cards.name: Craft Firestone
cards.description: 1 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Firestone Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Firestone+
cards.description: 1 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Firestone Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand.

cards.name: Fortify+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
runesmith:Enhance a card in your hand.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Backup Battery
cards.description:
Gain 2 of each runesmith:Element.
Draw 1 card.
Can be upgraded 4 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Backup Battery+1
cards.description:
Gain 3 of each runesmith:Element.
Draw 1 card.
Can be upgraded 4 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Chisel Stab
cards.description:
Deal 5 Damage.
Gain 2 runesmith:Ignis.

cards.name: Chisel Stab+
cards.description:
Deal 8 Damage.
Gain 2 runesmith:Ignis.

cards.name: Craft Magma
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Ignis 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Magma Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Magma+
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Ignis 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Magma Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Protectio
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Protectio+
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Earth Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain 2 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Earth Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Gain 2 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Energized Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Gain 3 Block.
Apply 1 Weak.
Gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Energized Chisel+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Gain 4 Block.
Apply 2 Weak.
Gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Grindstone
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
This turn, whenever you play a card,
Upgrade it.
runesmith:Enhance the card if it cannot be upgraded.

cards.name: Grindstone+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
For 2 turns, whenever you play a card,
Upgrade it.
runesmith:Enhance the card if it cannot be upgraded.

cards.name: Hammer Throw
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Draw 1 card and Upgrade it.

cards.name: Hammer Throw+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 2 cards and Upgrade them.

cards.name: Heat Exchange
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
This card gains 1 additional damage for each of your runesmith:Ignis.
Lose 1 runesmith:Ignis.

cards.name: Heat Exchange+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
This card gains 2 additional damage for each of your runesmith:Ignis.
Lose 1 runesmith:Ignis.

cards.name: Heated Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Heated Chisel+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Makeshift Armor
cards.description:
runesmith:Downgrade a random card in your draw pile, hand, or discard pile.
Gain 11 Block.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Makeshift Armor+
cards.description:
runesmith:Downgrade a random card in your draw pile, hand, or discard pile.
Gain 15 Block.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Overpower
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
runesmith:Downgrade 2 random cards in your hand.

cards.name: Overpower+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
runesmith:Downgrade 2 random cards in your hand.

cards.name: Repurpose
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Attack: Gain 2 runesmith:Ignis.
Skill: Gain 2 runesmith:Terra.
Power: Gain 2 runesmith:Aqua.
Status: Gain 1 of each.

cards.name: Repurpose+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card.
Attack: Gain 3 runesmith:Ignis.
Skill: Gain 3 runesmith:Terra.
Power: Gain 3 runesmith:Aqua.
Status: Gain 1 of each.
Curse: Gain 2 of each.

cards.name: Rune Hurl
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to deal 10 damage.
If you don't have any Runes, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Rune Hurl+
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to deal 14 damage.
If you don't have any Runes, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Shifting Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
runesmith:Downgrade a card in your hand, then Upgrade one.

cards.name: Shifting Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
runesmith:Downgrade a card in your hand, then Upgrade one.

cards.name: Static Cage
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune.
runesmith:Stasis a card in your hand.
Gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Static Cage+
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune.
runesmith:Stasis a card in your hand.
Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Unstable Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Dud Rune.
Gain 1 random runesmith:Element.

cards.name: Unstable Hammer+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Dud Rune.
Gain 1 random runesmith:Element.

cards.name: Accelerate
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Draw 1 card.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to draw 1 more card.

cards.name: Accelerate+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Draw 1 card.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to draw 2 more card.

cards.name: Attraction
cards.description:
Put 1 runesmith:Craft card from draw, discard or exhaust pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Attraction+
cards.description:
Put 2 runesmith:Craft card from draw, discard or exhaust pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Augment
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Lose all runesmith:Aqua.
Gain 1 Artifact for every 2 runesmith:Aqua lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Augment+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Lose half your runesmith:Aqua.
Gain 1 Artifact for each runesmith:Aqua lost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Chaotic Blast
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
1 of each runesmith:Element: runesmith:Craft 1 random Rune.

cards.name: Chaotic Blast+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.
2 of each runesmith:Element: runesmith:Craft 2 random Runes.

cards.name: Charged Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Spend 3 random runesmith:Elements and runesmith:Break your oldest runesmith:Dud Rune to runesmith:Craft a random non-Dud Rune.

cards.name: Charged Hammer+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Spend 2 random runesmith:Elements and runesmith:Break your oldest runesmith:Dud Rune to runesmith:Craft a random non-Dud Rune.

cards.name: Craft Incendium
cards.description: 3 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft an runesmith:Incendium Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Incendium+
cards.description: 3 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft an runesmith:Incendium Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Obretio
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Terra 1 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft an runesmith:Obretio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Obretio+
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Terra 1 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft an runesmith:Obretio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Reservo
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft a [#EFC851]Reservo Rune.

cards.name: Craft Reservo+
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft a [#EFC851]Reservo+ Rune.

cards.name: Craft Spiculum
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Ignis 1 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Spiculum Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Spiculum+
cards.description: 2 runesmith:Ignis 1 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Spiculum Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Vitae
cards.description: 1 runesmith:Ignis 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Vitae Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Vitae+
cards.description: 1 runesmith:Ignis 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Vitae Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Discharge
cards.description: runesmith:Break your oldest non-Dud Rune to gain 12 Block, deal 12 damage, and runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Dud Rune.

cards.name: Discharge+
cards.description: runesmith:Break your oldest non-Dud Rune to gain 16 Block, deal 16 damage, and runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Dud Rune.

cards.name: Double Up
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance 1 card in your hand.

cards.name: Double Up+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance 2 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Electrocute
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Take 3 damage.
runesmith:Stasis a card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Electrocute+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Take 2 damage.
runesmith:Stasis a card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Elementary Particles
cards.description: Choose an runesmith:Element to runesmith:Decay.

cards.name: Elementary Particles+
cards.description:
Choose an runesmith:Element to runesmith:Decay.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Empowerment
cards.description:
Gain Strength equal to your runesmith:Ignis this turn.
Gain Dexterity equal to your runesmith:Terra this turn.

cards.name: Empowerment+
cards.description:
Gain Strength equal to your runesmith:Ignis this turn.
Gain Dexterity equal to your runesmith:Terra this turn.

cards.name: Fiery Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Fiery Hammer+1
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage to ALL enemies.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Firestorm
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Firestorm+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 runesmith:Ignis and 1 runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Firewall
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
3 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft 2 runesmith:Firestone Runes with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Firewall+
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
3 runesmith:Ignis: runesmith:Craft 2 runesmith:Firestone Runes with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Frozen Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Apply 1 Slow.
Apply 3 runesmith:Ice-Cold.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Frozen Chisel+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Apply 1 Slow.
Apply 4 runesmith:Ice-Cold.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Go With The Flow
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 2 runesmith:Aqua.
Gain 1 runesmith:Potency.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Go With The Flow+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Gain 3 runesmith:Aqua.
Gain 1 runesmith:Potency.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hammer Time
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
runesmith:Enhance ALL your other cards containing "Hammer".

cards.name: Hammer Time+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
runesmith:Enhance ALL your other cards containing "Hammer" twice.

cards.name: Hammer and Chisel
cards.description:
Add a random Hammer card and a random Chisel card into your hand. They cost 1 less this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hammer and Chisel+
cards.description:
Add a random upgraded Hammer card and a random upgraded Chisel card into your hand. They cost 1 less this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lithium Ion
cards.description: Gain 2 runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Lithium Ion+
cards.description: Gain 3 runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Malloc
cards.description:
runesmith:Downgrade any number of cards in your hand.
Gain [E] for each card runesmith:Downgraded.

cards.name: Malloc+
cards.description:
Gain [E] .
runesmith:Downgrade any number of cards in your hand.
Gain [E] for each card runesmith:Downgraded.

cards.name: Nanites Cloud
cards.description:
ALL characters lose 13 Strength this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nanites Cloud+
cards.description:
ALL characters lose 18 Strength this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Negative Space
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block, reduced by 2 Block for each active Rune.
Deal 3 damage for each active Rune.

cards.name: Negative Space+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block, reduced by 2 Block for each active Rune.
Deal 4 damage for each active Rune.

cards.name: One for Everyone
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to
gain [E] , gain 1 Block,
deal 1 damage,
apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies,
gain 1 of each runesmith:Element and draw 1 card.

cards.name: One for Everyone+
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to
gain [E] , gain 1 Block,
deal 1 damage,
apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies,
gain 1 of each runesmith:Element and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Perfect Chisel
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Gain 1 of each runesmith:Element.
Gain 1 runesmith:Potency this turn.

cards.name: Perfect Chisel+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain 1 of each runesmith:Element.
Gain 2 runesmith:Potency this turn.

cards.name: Permafrost
cards.description:
Lose at most half your Block at the start of your turn.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Permafrost+
cards.description:
Lose at most half your Block at the start of your turn.
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra and 1 runesmith:Aqua.

cards.name: Powered Anvil
cards.description: Whenever you runesmith:Enhance a card, runesmith:Enhance it 1 additional time.

cards.name: Powered Anvil+
cards.description:
Whenever you runesmith:Enhance a card, runesmith:Enhance it 1 additional time.
runesmith:Enhance a card in your hand.

cards.name: Prism
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to 2 times the number of all your runesmith:Elements.
Lose half your runesmith:Elements.

cards.name: Prism+
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to 3 times the number of all your runesmith:Elements.
Lose half your runesmith:Elements.

cards.name: Refine
cards.description:
runesmith:Enhance a card X times.
Refund 1.

cards.name: Refine+
cards.description:
runesmith:Enhance a card X+1 times.
Refund 1.

cards.name: Reinforce
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Upgrade all cards in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reinforce+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance all cards in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Retool
cards.description:
Shuffle all upgraded or runesmith:enhanced cards from your discard pile into your draw pile. 
Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Retool+
cards.description:
Shuffle all upgraded or runesmith:enhanced cards from your discard pile into your draw pile. 
Draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Runic Blueprint
cards.description:
Add a random runesmith:Craft card into your hand.
It costs 0 and does not need runesmith:Elements this turn.
Gain 2 runesmith:Aqua.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Runic Blueprint+
cards.description:
Add a random runesmith:Craft card into your hand.
It costs 0 and does not need runesmith:Elements this turn.
Gain 2 runesmith:Aqua.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Superposition
cards.description:
Deal 26 damage.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to gain 13 Block.

cards.name: Superposition+
cards.description:
Deal 34 damage.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune to gain 18 Block.

cards.name: Terraform
cards.description:
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra.
Gain Block equals to 2 times the number of your runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: Terraform+
cards.description:
Gain 1 runesmith:Terra.
Gain Block equals to 3 times the number of your runesmith:Terra.

cards.name: White Balance
cards.description: Deal damage equals to 4 times the number of runesmith:Elements gained this turn.

cards.name: White Balance+
cards.description: Deal damage equals to 5 times the number of runesmith:Elements gained this turn.

cards.name: Arc Reactor
cards.description:
Gain 3 runesmith:Potency.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 runesmith:Potency.
Whenever you runesmith:Craft a Rune, lose 2 runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Arc Reactor+
cards.description:
Gain 4 runesmith:Potency.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 runesmith:Potency.
Whenever you runesmith:Craft a Rune, lose 2 runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Craft Industria
cards.description: 3 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft an [#EFC851]Industria Rune.

cards.name: Craft Industria+
cards.description: 3 runesmith:Aqua: runesmith:Craft an [#EFC851]Industria+ Rune.

cards.name: Craft Medicinae
cards.description:
5 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Medicinae Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.
Exhaust.
Cannot be runesmith:Stasis.

cards.name: Craft Medicinae+
cards.description:
5 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Medicinae Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.
Exhaust.
Cannot be runesmith:Stasis.

cards.name: Craft Prismatica
cards.description: 2 of each runesmith:Element: runesmith:Craft a [#EFC851]Prismatica Rune.

cards.name: Craft Prismatica+
cards.description: 2 of each runesmith:Element: runesmith:Craft a [#EFC851]Prismatica+ Rune.

cards.name: Creator Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, runesmith:Enhance 2 cards.

cards.name: Creator Form+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, runesmith:Enhance 3 cards.

cards.name: Duct Tape
cards.description: At the start of your turn, runesmith:Stasis up to 1 card.

cards.name: Duct Tape+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, runesmith:Stasis up to 2 card.

cards.name: Duplicate
cards.description: This turn, create a copy of the next Rune you runesmith:Craft.

cards.name: Duplicate+
cards.description: This turn, create a copy of the next 2 Runes you runesmith:Craft.

cards.name: Fission Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune twice.

cards.name: Fission Hammer+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
runesmith:Break your oldest Rune twice.

cards.name: Generate Forcefield
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your X oldest non-Dud Runes. Prevent the next time you would lose HP for each Rune runesmith:Broken.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Generate Forcefield+
cards.description:
runesmith:Break your X+1 oldest non-Dud Runes. Prevent the next time you would lose HP for each Rune runesmith:Broken.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Grand Slam
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
runesmith:Enhance all cards in your hand.

cards.name: Grand Slam+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
runesmith:Enhance all cards in your hand twice.

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.description:
runesmith:Downgrade ALL your cards. Lose all runesmith:Elements. At the end of next turn, deal damage equals to 5 times the number of runesmith:downgraded cards to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Last Stand+
cards.description:
runesmith:Downgrade ALL your cards. Lose all runesmith:Elements. At the end of next turn, deal damage equals to 7 times the number of runesmith:downgraded cards to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lightning Rod
cards.description: For 2 turns, you lose runesmith:Elements instead of HP. Gain 2 of each runesmith:Element.

cards.name: Lightning Rod+
cards.description: For 3 turns, you lose runesmith:Elements instead of HP. Gain 2 of each runesmith:Element.

cards.name: Metallurgical Research
cards.description:
Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance ALL your cards after 2 turns.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Metallurgical Research+
cards.description:
Upgrade and runesmith:Enhance ALL your cards after 1 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Replicating Barrier
cards.description:
2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.
Every 2 turns, 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Replicating Barrier+
cards.description:
2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.
Every 2 turns, 2 runesmith:Terra: runesmith:Craft a runesmith:Protectio Rune with !RS:Pot! runesmith:Potency.

cards.name: Supernova
cards.description:
runesmith:Break all your Runes.
Draw 1 card and gain [E] for each non-Dud Rune runesmith:Broken.

cards.name: Supernova+
cards.description:
runesmith:Break all your Runes.
Draw 1 card and gain [E] for each non-Dud Rune runesmith:Broken.

cards.name: Unlimited Power
cards.description: runesmith:Elements are no longer needed for runesmith:Crafting.

cards.name: Unlimited Power+
cards.description:
Innate.
runesmith:Elements are no longer needed for runesmith:Crafting.

relics.name: Broken Ruby
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 2 runesmith:Ignis.
At the start of your turn, Enhance a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: A crystal that resembles a red gem. Although it is broken, faint energy still remains.

relics.name: AutoHammer
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Skills in 1 turn, runesmith:Enhance a random card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: An automatic hammer which never stops hammering.

relics.name: Emergency Provisions
relics.description: Every time you play a Craft card, gain 1 random runesmith:Element.
relics.flavorText: A self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging.

relics.name: Minicore
relics.description: Gain 1 runesmith:Potency at the start of the combat.
relics.flavorText: This peculiar orb was once used as an energy storage.

relics.name: Nanobots
relics.description: At the start of combat, runesmith:Enhance all cards in your hand.

relics.name: Locket
relics.description: One time each combat, if your health drops below 15%, add Last Stand to the top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: An image of unknown yet familiar figure resides within.

relics.name: Core Crystal
relics.description: Replaces Broken Ruby. All runesmith:Element gains are increased by 50%. Raises maximum runesmith:Elements to 20.

relics.name: Pocket Reactor
relics.description: runesmith:Elements are no longer needed for crafting. All cards lose 2 runesmith:Potency.

relics.name: Uranium Anvil
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. runesmith:Downgrade a random card in your draw pile, hand, or discard pile each turn.
relics.flavorText: This block of metal holds massive amount of energy but weakens anyone who come near it.
